Sentencas: Spray pyrolysis has been applied to deposit a wide variety of thin films.
Titulo: Thin film deposition using spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: These films were used in various devices such as solar cells, sensors, and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Thin film deposition using spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: It is observed that often the properties of deposited thin films depend on the preparation conditions.
Titulo: Thin film deposition using spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: An extensive review of the effects of spray parameters on film quality is given to demonstrate the importance of the process of optimization.
Titulo: Thin film deposition using spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: The substrate surface temperature is the most critical parameter as it influences film roughness, cracking, crystallinity, etc.
Titulo: Thin film deposition using spray pyrolysis

Sentencas: Processes involved in the spray pyrolysis technique are discussed in this review as well.
Titulo: Thin film deposition using spray pyrolysis
